participant_1.background:
I play my guitar to express my feelings.
I just got the most adorable teddy bear to add to my collection!
I'm still exploring my cultural heritage.
I would be a seamstress who can sew with my magic hands and never have to worry about knee pain again.
i am really excited to see how game of thrones ends.

participant_2.background:
My favorites things are the ones that I share with my mom.
i am twenty five years old.
I enjoy spending time with my nieces and nephews, helping them get fit and have fun at the same time.
I listen to the music of my youth to feel like a kid again.
I enjoyed a nice walk outside to appreciate the weather.

content.text: I'm doing well! Thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing great! I just got back from a walk outside. It was beautiful weather today.
That's great! I love taking walks outside. It's so peaceful.
Me too! It's a great way to clear your head and relax.
I agree! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play guitar and read. I also enjoy watching movies and TV shows.
Oh, that's cool! I love to read too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all sorts of books, but I especially love historical fiction.
That's great! I love historical fiction too. I'm currently reading a book about the American Revolution.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I've never read a book about the American Revolution.
It's really good! You should check it out.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
